titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SAMPLE COLLECTION YEAR AND MONTH - Description

div.p: SAMPLE COLLECTION YEAR AND MONTH is the year and month of the recorded SAMPLE COLLECTION DATE AND TIME when a SAMPLE was collected.
For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, SAMPLE COLLECTION YEAR AND MONTH is submitted instead of SAMPLE COLLECTION DATE AND TIME, where the data set record is anonymised.
